attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Generate Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 telemetry configuration for CEF/FIB operational monitoring (forwarding entries and statistics). Use gRPC with no TLS. Telemetry server 192.0.2.112 port 57500. Choose relevant sensor-paths."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group CEF-FIB-OPR
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-fib-cef-oper:fib/summary
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-fib-cef-oper:fib/nodes/node/summary
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-fib-cef-oper:fib/nodes/node/ipv4-vrfs/ipv4-vrf/ipv4-nh-tables/ipv4-nh-table/ipv4-nh-entries/ipv4-nh-entry
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-fib-cef-oper:fib/nodes/node/ipv6-vrfs/ipv6-vrf/ipv6-nh-tables/ipv6-nh-table/ipv6-nh-entries/ipv6-nh-entry
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-fib-cef-oper:fib/nodes/node/ipv4-vrfs/ipv4-vrf/ipv4-fib-statistics
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-fib-cef-oper:fib/nodes/node/ipv6-vrfs/ipv6-vrf/ipv6-fib-statistics
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.112
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-CEF-FIB-OPR
  sensor-group-id CEF-FIB-OPR sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
